PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.section1Content: AI Voice Recorder (hereinafter "the Service") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.
PrivacyPage.section2_1Content: The Service processes audio data that you record. This audio data is sent to Azure Speech Services and Azure Translator for transcription and translation purposes.
PrivacyPage.section2_2Content: We may collect anonymized usage statistics to improve the Service. This includes feature usage frequency and general error information.
PrivacyPage.section4Content: Your recording data is securely stored in Azure Blob Storage. You can delete your recording data from the history at any time. Deleted data is also completely removed from backup systems within 30 days.
PrivacyPage.section5Content: The Service uses the following Microsoft Azure services:
PrivacyPage.section5Footer: These services are operated in accordance with Microsoft's Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPage.section6Content: The Service employs industry-standard security practices to protect your data. All data transfers are encrypted with HTTPS/TLS, and stored data is also encrypted.
PrivacyPage.section7Content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through GitHub Issues.
PrivacyPage.section8Content: This Privacy Policy may be updated as needed. If there are significant changes, we will notify you through the Service.
